original:
A wizard is never late, @p . Nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to!

Our meeting here in Bag End is no coincidence.
We have something important to talk about!
translation:
巫师从不迟到，@p，也不会早到，只会按他的意思准时抵达！

我们在袋底洞的会面并非巧合。
我们有重要的事情要谈！

original: Hello Gandalf, nice to see you! What happened? You look worried.
translation: 嗨，甘道夫，很高兴见到你！发生了什么事？你看起来忧心忡忡。
